channel.title: Adding the status to your server on forums/smf/html
channel.description:
Hello, On the development ive been in and working on, chemicalscape, we are trying to add a server status on there from www.mooservers.com, (you click on it, and it says weather the server is online or not). Im no good at html, so where would i add this:
<script language='JavaScript' src='http://www.mooservers.com/button.js.php?host=www.chemicalscape.com&port=43954&key=2177'></script>
on a smf forums?

item.title: Adding the status to your server on forums/smf/html
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Strange, my host allows fsockopen.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding the status to your server on forums/smf/html

item.title: Adding the status to your server on forums/smf/html
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

[quote=".Fusion, post:12, topic:163668"]Or just use some simple PHP

[php]

<?php $checkCHAR = @fsockopen('lollerscape.whatever.com', '5000', $ERRNO, $ERRSTR, 1); if($checkCHAR) { echo('
Scape is Online
'); } else { echo('
Scape is Offline
'); } ?>

[/php]
you could even allow users to add their own with this all you would have to do is add a form a little more php.[/quote]
unfortunately some/most commercial public web servers do not allow fsockopen, which really bumbed me out when I started renting one, however if you are using like your own computer as a web server, sure it works fine, and if that computer is also hosting the RS server, even the better because you can do localhost instead of lollerscape.whatever.com which would be even faster.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding the status to your server on forums/smf/html

Or just use some simple PHP

[php]

<?php $checkCHAR = @fsockopen('lollerscape.whatever.com', '5000', $ERRNO, $ERRSTR, 1); if($checkCHAR) { echo('
Scape is Online
'); } else { echo('
Scape is Offline
'); } ?>

[/php]
you could even allow users to add their own with this all you would have to do is add a form a little more php.

Read full topic

Anyways do you want it to be a button added to the top of the forum index or what? Please use more details if you want quality help.

item.title: Adding the status to your server on forums/smf/html
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“p0unding, post:8, topic:163668”][quote author=RXVL link=topic=222373.msg1923055#msg1923055 date=1197256198]

Asking a question you retarded dumbass, and advertising? no thats part of the html code. Dumbass.

HTML CODES! THEY ARE COOLER THAN JAVA CODES? DO I PUT THEM IN CLIENT.JAVA???

Idiot, learn fucking HTML.

Thats what im trying to do fag, and you call me an idiot?

Yes he does.

io9 > you

Cl1k h3r 4 chmicklscpe

Put that in your website.

EDIT: Rather don’t, it’s a nice m e a t s p i n redirect. I don’t feel like having a dot.
[/quote]

I might not be good at forums, but im good a programming dipshit.Hense the reason why I have much better rep on moparisthebest.com so dont treat me for a mug bud.[/quote]
AHAHAHA

Rep is too moparscape what aids is to Africa. REP means FUCKSHIT on moparscape, it’s in a vaster quantity than water. The only posts I’ve ever made on moparscape are FLAME and yet I have 51 rep over there…

Rep != an indicator of your programming skill.

You cannot program well at all. Your probably another person who thinks they know Java because they can add some C&P edited bullshit to a moparscape server.
[center] If you have nothing nice to say, then don’t say it.[/center]

Read full topic
